EmailTemplate.subject: Out with the Old, In with the New!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Clear up your view of the sky with the latest LCD technology when you upgrade to Primus Elite DU-875 displays with Flightstar.
Primus Elite is more than a display upgrade - it’s a new avionics system. While initially designed to overcome upcoming CRT DU-870 obsolescence, DU-875 delivers:
- Enhanced flight management tools
- Improved safety and reliability - Less maintenance - Reduced cost of ownership - A 12-month warranty - Does not require additional pilot training or modifications to the cockpit - Downtime for the upgrade in most cases is only ten working days
For a limited time, when you upgrade all four display units on your Lear 40/45 and install Primus Elite today, you’ll be eligible to take advantage of Honeywell trade-in credits of up to $140,000 plus receive one free year of MSP Avionics coverage.
Prefer a phased approach? You’ll still receive a $35,000 Honeywell trade-in credit for each DU-870 display you replace, as well as a $2,500 discount per display on a new or extended MSP contract. These offers expire on December 31, 2019, so don’t delay.
